## üîê The Most Conservative System Wins

Bitcoin‚Äôs conservatism is often framed as weakness in a world obsessed with disruption. In reality, conservative systems dominate at the civilizational layer because they preserve trust, memory, and coordination over time. Bitcoin‚Äôs restraint is not accidental‚Äîit is what makes it uniquely capable of supporting innovation, freedom, and sovereignty across generations.
